Deepwater Facility Selectionpst spelogojpg The Latest in Deepwater Facility Selection Hear what the experts think Join in the debate IS SUBSEA PROCESSING A VIABLE OPTION February An SPE Gulf Coast Section Business Technology Workshop Location Wyndham Greenspoint Hotel Greenspoint Drive Time am pm Everyone is eager to take advantage of technologies that may reliably enhance profitability and subsea processing may offer just that But is the technology ready for prime time This workshop will bring together experts from contractors vendors and oil companies to present debate and discuss the issues Designed for operators contractors and business people contemplating deepwater developments this workshop is a forum to exchange ideas on both the technical and commercial issues surrounding subsea processing Topics Include Major oil companies believe it will work the million investment The Devils advocate view of subsea processing The Regulators perspective Multiphase pumping Reliability vs Intervention the economic tradeoffs Ultra deepwater Solutions Panel Discussion Price for SPE members in advance for nonmembers in advance at the door Complete information on the Workshop as well as a registration form can be found at wwwspegcsorgcalendarvieweventaspid calendarvieweventaspid
